display_long_description:
Gripper's is leaping into VR — bringing over 40 mind-bending puzzles designed to test your wits and reflexes in a whole new dimension!



Can you reach the treasure at the end?Each level challenges you to think creatively and make the most of your environment — all in full VR.



🧩 Puzzle Highlights:

- Use blocks to block enemy sightlines and sneak your way through
- Turn defeated enemies into makeshift rafts to cross water
- Master teleportation mechanics to move yourself, blocks, and other objects
- Collect every key to unlock the exit and advance

[media]

🎮 Key Features:

- All-new VR controls let you zoom in and out for a fresh perspective
- Over 40 handcrafted puzzles, with more on the way post-launch
- Minimal hand-holding for a rewarding challenge
- A quirky, fun story with charming characters
- Inspired by a beloved classic game
- Free puzzle updates and new modes coming soon

Whether you're a puzzle master or just getting started, Gripper's VR will pull you in with its clever mechanics and imaginative world.

[media]
